lines.text: I'm not one of you anemic creatures who can get nourishment from a lettuce leaf - I'm a musician, I'm an artist! I have zest and appetite - and I like food!
"If I didn't think you meant so well, I'd feel like slapping your face"
Vioet! Lunch! Ham, honey, cake, and coffee!
Go out back and get that honey-glazed, peanut-fed, sweet Virginia ham.
You 'ain't gonna feed that man is you?
Jefferson, I'd feed the devil 'hiself if he done polished up the smile on Miss Maggie's face like that!
Whoever heard of an ounce of brandy?
He always likes his little tune 'fore he goes to bed.
Darling! I give up! You can paint the house white, the trees white...
